Class BVRecommendations

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Bazaarvoice Recommendations API for getting custom product recommendations

    • Method Detail

      • getRecommendedProductsWithCategoryId

        public void getRecommendedProductsWithCategoryId(int limit,
                                                 java.lang.String categoryId,
                                                 BVRecommendations.BVRecommendationsCallback callback)
        Parameters:
        limit - max number of recommended products default is 20 valid limits 1...50; will use default if out of range
        categoryId - used to filter recommended products within a category. Mutually exclusive with productId. if productId and categoryId are set, productId will be used
        callback - callback to provide list of Products or handle errors

      • getRecommendedProductsWithProductId

        public void getRecommendedProductsWithProductId(int limit,
                                                java.lang.String productId,
                                                BVRecommendations.BVRecommendationsCallback callback)
        Parameters:
        limit - max number of recommended products default is 20 valid limits 1...50; will use default if out of range
        productId - used to filter recommended products to similar products
        callback - callback to provide list of Products or handle errors

      • getRecommendedProducts

        public void getRecommendedProducts(int limit,
                                   BVRecommendations.BVRecommendationsCallback callback)
        Parameters:
        limit - max number of recommended products
        callback - callback to provide list of Products or handle errors
